title: NFL Fining Players for Wearing 9/11 Memorial Cleats?
subtitle: Rumor held that the NFL fined players for violating league uniform rules by wearing 9/11 memorial cleats during football games played on 11 September 2016.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The NFL fined players for violating league uniform rules by wearing 9/11 memorial cleats during football games played on 11 September 2016.
